website_summaries.verdict: Gaia Herbs powder is an effective, versatile pain reliever
pros: The pleasing, spicy taste makes this easy to drink
Buyers say that it works to relieve menstrual cramps, arthritic pain, and migraines
cons: The powder tends to settle at the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Watch out!!! This product contains maltodexrin!!
customer_reviews.text: What a bunch of crap. How deceiving Gaia. Maktodextrin is not listed in the main ingredients — but hidden in “other”. You must be part of the ill-care ecosystem. I choose not to be your customer for any of your products anymore. Goodbye. Ps - there is no such thing as organic maltodextrin - it is a chemical. What is with people?
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: For those complaining it arrives half full:
customer_reviews.text: For those complaining it arrives half full: Yes, the packaging is twice as big as the amount of product. However is not deceptive: it says 3.7 ounces, and I weight it and in effect that's how much it comes. If you think it's overpriced, don't buy it and then leave a negative review, just don't buy it. Most Golden Milks in the market are expensive. Here is a pic of a brand new product. Weights 106 grams which translates as 3.73 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Iván C.

customer_reviews.title: SO glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I've heard about golden milk for awhile now, and waffled between trying to make it myself or just buying it ready-made. After doing some research, and weighing the convenience factor + cost of buying the necessary quality ingredients to make my own, I decided to try Gaia's ready-to-use formula. SO glad that I did! It was packaged well, arrived quickly, and has definitely helped me relax at night -- I mix a teaspoon of the powder into a cup of very warm almond milk and drink shortly before bed. Warming (in a cozy way, NOT hot flashes!), earthy, comforting... I feel nourished and calm after drinking it. Will definitely be buying it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product really has worked for me. As a sufferer of terrific pain at times, I did not really believe that it would be much help, but it has really made life more pleasant for me. I had a lot of stabbing pains in my joints the first time that I used it, and within an hour they were gone. I have also experience having more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth giving it a try!
customer_reviews.text: This turmeric milk is super sweet and delicious! I have tried to make my own in the past and it always turns out spicy and difficult to get down. This is really enjoyable and has a nice spice taste like Christmas! I've used it when I've had menstrual cramps and migraines for the anti-inflammatory properties, doesn't cure it but helps alleviate it a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed bc I loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to make golden milk seamlessly in the morning or night and this mix was my favorite until I looked more closely at the ingredients. Unfortunately, it contains maltodextrin (and though it says it's from organic rice & non GMO), that doesn't make any sense and it doesn't mean that maltodextrin included in this isn't highly processed & terrible for gut bacteria, blood sugar, weight-loss and overall health. As much as I enjoyed this product, I'd rather go the longer way of making golden milk using all natural, unprocessed ingredients. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Hormone balanced staple
customer_reviews.text: Ladies! This is a staple to help balance those hormones. A must buy as it is easy and seamless to make with a nut milk 🥛
customer_reviews.author: YoginiR

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS CLEAN FLAVORS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim...I used to spend allot of time where this is produced in Brevard NC at Gaia. I mix this with homemade oat milk...my lids even love it...tastes like oranges, cream and holidays all at the same time. Time will tell if I get any nutritional benefit but as a drink.WOW...highly recommend this. I have tasted hundreds of teas and other beverages, as a chef and food product formulator I must say this is something special.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Snow

customer_reviews.title: I really love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. It is a healthy and soothing drink to close my intermittent fasting "eating window" with. Especially good mixed with warm almond or cashew milk. Plenty of recipes online for making this, but the convenience is worth not having to source all the ingredients and make it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Nice taste but a little strong
customer_reviews.text: Tasted very nice mixed with warm almond milk, but gave me a bit of a stomach ache. I think the recommended amount is too strong for my digestive system. Too much turmeric can do that to me. Anyway, it's worth a try if you like the flavor of golden milk, or spiced drinks in general.
customer_reviews.author: KBCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product for arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for arthritis. I add this to protein shakes daily. I can really tell the difference if I don't take it.
customer_reviews.author: LG112

customer_reviews.title: Good buy - stress reliever
customer_reviews.text: Made my 1st golden milk last night (used unsweetened vanilla almond milk) and I could instantly feel the calmness rush over me. I was knocked out sleep within 10 minutes of drinking it and woke up refreshed. I'm guessing that's the Ashwaganha in it. Has a nice nutty, subtly sweet taste (I added a 1/2 tsp of agave nectar). All around great product. I can't wait to see how it is a month in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mild and relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: 4 plus stars for the product. It has a nice mild taste, is very relaxing as a warm drink before bed, seems to help me sleep more peacefully but the only drawback for me is that I can never get it to mix completely and end up eating whats left in the bottom at the end, despite stirring throughout the time spent drinking it. Otherwise, wonderful product that I will continue to buy and do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Dodson

customer_reviews.title: This was the worse tasting tumeric product I have ever tried to drink
customer_reviews.text: This was the worse tasting tumeric product I have ever tried to drink. And it never wanted to dissolve...I would return it if I had tried it sooner. Now it says I waited too long.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Graff

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Heat up the whole mixture, and spoon in one very nice teaspoon of of Justin's honey almond butter ....... ahhhhhhmazing!!
customer_reviews.author: John M. Krumenacker

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was intrigued by this product for the general health benefits. I could not get past the flavor. I made it with almond milk and added some cinnamon. I tried it a few different ways, but nothing tasted great to me. I felt like I was adding a bunch of other things just to make work, which seemed to defeat the purpose of drinking Golden Milk.
customer_reviews.author: sjvx

customer_reviews.title: Rich, soothing,& it works!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff- discovered by mistake. This is even good in yogurt , with maple syrup sweetener, than it is in almond-coconut milk. My meds left me bloated, until I discovered this. And it is offered on subscribe and save" which makes it even better. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: libbye

customer_reviews.title: The taste was bland with a hint of vanilla so very easy to drink
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a full night's sleep in over 20 years even with prescription medication. I was skeptical but decided to try in warm milk last night. Note, I've never been a fan of warm milk unless it's filled with tons of cocoa and whipped cream. I used regular milk. The taste was bland with a hint of vanilla so very easy to drink. I woke up this morning refreshed and in total shock I slept all night. Will make this a nightly regimen in hopes that it will help my osteoarthritis as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H Williams

customer_reviews.title: Full Price, Half Filled, Bad Reaction
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I did not read the reviews before purchasing the product. The product arrived with less than half its contents. Now, I understand that powders settle, but this is ridiculous! The taste is a little bland and to add insult; I had an allergy reaction. I stopped using the product, and the allergy cleared up. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I add some coconut sugar plus some organic dark chocolate powder and both my husband and I find we sleep much deeper and wake feeling well rested. I use coconut milk with it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schimpf

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted! A friend turned me on to this after she spent a few months in India. I make it with rice milk and a touch of coconut milk and honey. I have it almost every night before bed, my body craves it.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalDesigner

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty good. It does have a slightly herbal taste
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good. It does have a slightly herbal taste, but I don't mind it. I can't make turmeric lattes that taste this good. The black pepper extract gives it a slightly spicy taste, sort of like clove/cinnamon. I would suggest putting just a spoonful of honey in it to help enhance the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of this. I mix with almond milk or cahsew milk and a teaspoon of coconut oil. Sweetened with a spoonful of honey and this is a great start to the day. Makes me feel good
customer_reviews.author: Thorsmom

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with my Matcha Tea in the morning. I also add a shake of cinnamon, coconut manna, almond milk and a little honey. It tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Judi G

customer_reviews.title: Great in smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in smoothies and soups. Great way to get your turmeric, etc.!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Temple

customer_reviews.title: It was ok nice flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it has pepper in it and dates. Not sweet. I enjoy it. Jar was a little big for the actual product inside. It’s not much believe me. But you don’t need that much for a palatable mug.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck 29

customer_reviews.title: Delicious AND nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I was caught off guard by how delicious this product is. Love that it's super-healthy, but wow - it's super yummy, too! I often add a tsp. to my BulletProof coffee in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: This drink is yummy
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my shelf until I finally gave it to a friend. She made it for me in a thermos and convinced me to try it ( I hate turmeric and I only bought it because it is supposed to be healthful) Wow I was surprised. This drink tastes amazing. I hope it helps with inflammation too.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Noel

customer_reviews.title: No seal at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January, but decided to write a review today after reading other comments. I should have returned it, but I did not. I tossed it in the trash. It was completely unsealed. No seal on outside and nothing sealing under the cap. It was completely full, but anyone could have tampered with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Organic and much cheaper here!
customer_reviews.text: I love drinking golden milk at the end of a long day. Drinking it has also helped with my chronic inflammation due to a health issue. The ashwaganda in the product also helps with stress-relief and relaxation. My order arrived quickly, and it's much cheaper here! Health food stores usually sell this for about $19.99
customer_reviews.author: carrot

customer_reviews.title: Correct net weight even though jar not full
customer_reviews.text: A number of reviewers complained that the jar was not completely full. That was true for me also. However, when I weighed the contents I found that it is exactly what they list as the net weight. So they are using a jar that is larger than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gattuso

customer_reviews.title: Convenient GOLDEN MILK mix
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Gaia Golden Milk mix in warm vanilla flavored cashew milk or warm vanilla flavored coconut milk. I tried it in unflavored hemp milk but had to add a little honey. Eventhough the jar is small and only half full it contains 30 servings.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Salim

customer_reviews.title: I've seen other review about the amount of powder info ...
customer_reviews.text: I've seen other review about the amount of powder info the jar. I don't have the time to measure out the powder in oz... but I'm curious if I'm getting a full 3.7 oz info this jar. Will probably just make my own powder from now on and save a bunch of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christine N.

customer_reviews.title: So happy I tried it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for nights I don't want to go through the trouble of making golden milk from scratch. Taste is great, and whisks easily into almond/coconut milk. Aside from the milk, I will also whisk in some coconut butter and fresh cinnamon. It is even good with a little raw cacao sprinkled in. I make it before bed and feel instantly relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because of its anti inflammatory properties, I figured I would give it a try. The taste is interesting. I do not sweeten mine at all, and use warm unsweetened coconut milk. You’ll need a milk frothier to smooth out the lumps, it’s difficult to mix without one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O

customer_reviews.title: Good for you but not a great taste for me
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. I like the taste best in 2% milk vs. almond milk. I definitely didn't like it in my coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!  So delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted! I add this to hot soy milk at least once each day. I like to add a teaspoon of cinnamon-infused honey and it makes the most delightful drink in the morning and at bedtime. I tried this and one other brand but this is by far the best tasting and dissolves more completely than the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: heathermaybe

customer_reviews.title: This product does work.....give it time to build up in your body
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I would not categorize it as "pain relief", but what it does do is help you sleep, sounder, and longer. While the Turmeric has been known to have healing benefits, I believe the ability to sleep (deep) and dream has restorative benefits which help the body heal itself. This taste fantastic too.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Massaro Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Soooo Yummy ... Makes enjoying turmeric tea simple and easy. I’ve even used this as a poultry seasoning addition. Soooo yummy. You don’t get a LOT of product but you can get this and replicate if the taste is appealing to you.
customer_reviews.author: L. Li

customer_reviews.title: Container less than half full!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Gaia Herb Golden Milk glass container had less than 50% of the content, ie. was more than half empty. very disappointing to see the container < half full and only providing 10-12 servings. What happened
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile for cooking and helps me with pain relief
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutely perfect to add to so many of the foods I make and it truly takes the pain away in my body with my arthritis and knee pain better than supplements or topical cream with this spice in it !
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: So far nothing
customer_reviews.text: Been a week so far nothing.was hoping it would help the arthritis in my hands. I do not feel anything. But going to keep using it till it’s empty.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I substitute my GM for coffee and helps the body heal and feel satisfied. Completely takes sweet tooth away if anyone of ...
customer_reviews.text: 3.7 ounces is 3.7 ounces - whether in a big jar or little jar....I use my jars to make my body scrubs when done. I substitute my GM for coffee and helps the body heal and feel satisfied. Completely takes sweet tooth away if anyone of fighting Candida or sugar issues..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Might be great eventually!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and the directions were very clear. I'm still trying to fine tune it to make the flavor more interesting - not just good for me. I don't tend to reach for it when I want a hot drink so that defeats the purpose of buying it. We'll see if that changes with the addition of spices.
customer_reviews.author: JAK in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It really helps with headaches or period cramps. At first I was expecting it to be sweet but it is not you can add agave or honey if you want but now I just mix with almond milk and I like the taste. I haven’t found a Gaia product that wasn’t great
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Definitely lives up to it's name. When I drink ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lives up to it's name. When I drink it in unsweetened almond milk, I get the feeling I'm doing something healthy (whether I really am or not). A tang of pepper at the end. I'll keep at it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kyro

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like turmeric
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a beneficial health product. I've been reading about the benefits of tumeric but that's exactly what it tastes like to me. I mixed with warm milk and added honey. I ordered based on the many reviews claiming how delicious it was. I guess it's just not "my cup of tea"
customer_reviews.author: Terria527

customer_reviews.title: Worth Getting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but seems deceiving when you open it and find so much extra room left in the jar. I use this every day in my protein drink. It doesn’t mix well by itself in cold milk or almond milk, but does not taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good...and made me feel better within the day
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the taste. It is in powder form, so it is a bit hard to mix, but I am pleased with the taste. And believe me, I wouldn't waste my calories on bad tasting food. Foodie here
customer_reviews.author: Blueyes

customer_reviews.title: I live this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Thus is how I drink it... warm up a cup of milk in a pot, add cinnamon and honey to taste. Keep stirring till all the lumps are out and enjoy.. It's very relaxing..
customer_reviews.author: boricuadecoamo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Admit that it seems less in the glass jar but man was this such a great tasting golden milk! I recently have been drinking my tea just plain and no more sugar and this was Excellent. Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product, but why half full?
customer_reviews.text: Received a half full jar, amazon sent me another and it's also not full. I guess this is the way they come? Product itself tastes great, I really recommend it, I just don't understand the wasteful packaging,
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help with sleep; had been taking separate supplements to aid sleep (turmeric, ginger), and having heard about golden milk, decided to try this Gaia supplement. It doesn't taste bad, but it just hasn't made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Pat R.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes okay, I just have a hard time remembering ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes okay, I just have a hard time remembering to drink it before bed. I'm not sure it helped that much the few times I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Heintze

customer_reviews.title: The product is great..
customer_reviews.text: The product is great....the product packaging is an EPIC FAIL. The contents are sold by weight....so the brand new jar arrives and it is HALF FULL. They should either sell it by volume and fill the damn jar...or use more well suited packaging for the volume. Can you imagine if you purchased a quart of milk and it was half full? That's what opening this jar felt like. #deceptivepackaging
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mystery

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes amazing. I was looking for something healthy that doesn’t have caffeine so I can start cutting back and this definitely does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Kailene

customer_reviews.title: Taste great makes you feel good
customer_reviews.text: Taste great makes you feel good. If you have tummy issues or swelling. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rapuzel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love golden milk and this is a great way to get it fast and easy (vs. mixing my own). Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve O'Clery

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of this but the jar only lasts me a couple weeks. Additionally it doesn’t blend into milk well and will really stain cups. Better options out there
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good golden milk
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Tastes great in flax milk, encourages sleep Cons: bit pricey per use. It’s too early to gauge pain relief
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.text: Love ! The ashwagandha is not to much and I sleep great as well.
customer_reviews.author: jessica jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal, half empty jar
customer_reviews.text: Seal was broken on the jar and it was half empty. Request a refund. I had to throw it away since it could have been compromised.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Safety issue. Not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: The safety seal was broken and the white foam-like cap under the cover was also loose. I threw it out. Couldn't trust it. I will look for a different seller for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donté

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be mixed with something because just milk is gross
customer_reviews.author: Waverly

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE before bed time drink!
customer_reviews.text: I love mixing this with really warm plant-based milk about an hour before I go to bed. Perfect for reducing inflammation in your body!
customer_reviews.author: Kori McKee

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to regimen for health
customer_reviews.text: While I can say that I have added tumeric into my diet, due to arthritis and recommended by several practitioners, I enjoy the product for itself. Soothing anytime of day ( I prefer morning before coffee).
customer_reviews.author: Golferev

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with organic whole milk and a tiny bit of honey. ITS SOOOOO GOOD!!!!! It's like drinking a comforting hug in a cup! So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: DePlume

customer_reviews.title: Golden Milk
customer_reviews.text: I love this golden milk it truly helps with my osteoarthritis I have one 6 ounce glass a day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt care for the taste
customer_reviews.text: If you like tumeric flavor, this may be for you. I couldnt stand the taste, so I would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Oldham

customer_reviews.title: I like it with Vanilla Soy Milk as I prefer it ...
customer_reviews.text: Tasty. I like it with Vanilla Soy Milk as I prefer it a bit sweeter, but I really am enjoying it as a bedtime treat.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I take it before going to bed & when I take it I sleep MUCH BETTER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: joni

customer_reviews.title: love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i love it! i mix this powder with my vanilla coconut milk blend it for 1 min. with a tbsp. of agave syrup taste delicious! will buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cifra

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the golden milk I had previously to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Luvprincess

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best
customer_reviews.text: Great for breakfast or after dinner before bed. I make mine with almond milk and a tablespoon of honey. This is the best golden milk powder I have tried. It will remain in my cabinet forever.
customer_reviews.author: J Brian

customer_reviews.title: Less than half the product
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that you are paying for less than half of this jar. Seriously, there's *not* that much in there. The product is just fine, nothing out of this world, but man, I wish I would've had a sense of how much I was actually buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golden Milk so good for you
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this is so good. I love the flavor and drinking as a pre bedtime snack.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl K

customer_reviews.title: Loved the taste
customer_reviews.text: Loved the taste! Melted one teaspoon coconut oil over medium heat added one teaspoon of golden milk mix and whisked with 8 once almond milk. Bought this product because of it's anti inflammatory and calming effects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't seem to get the combination right with this-tried it ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to get the combination right with this-tried it with almond milk (horrible) and oat milk (only slightly better). Would probably taste ok with cow's milk so may try that next. V. strong.
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and company
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I’ve tried several different companies and this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi nosko

customer_reviews.title: Knocks me out
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with this is that it doesn’t completely melt away in milk, it still kind of clumps up, so you have to stir consistently but other than that, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gnarly
customer_reviews.text: It has an offensive flavor. I’m not sure if that is how they all taste, it’s drinkable, but I needed 16 Oz of water immediately after to help wash it down.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Krantz

customer_reviews.title: I drink it every night
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting golden milk out there. I take it before bed and it really helps me get a good night's rest.
customer_reviews.author: Tania F

customer_reviews.title: A staple at my house!
customer_reviews.text: I drink this everyday! It’s my mid morning pick me up, I feel like it awakens my brain when I am in a fog and I can tell it has helped with inflammation in my body.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff at best price
customer_reviews.text: Best price on product I love. I make a mixture of this brand and the TUMERIC TONIC (powder) which is spicier and it's really good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Was hopeful about this product but simply don't think there ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hopeful about this product but simply don't think there is enough tumeric in it to make a noticeable physical difference.
customer_reviews.author: The Therapy House

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great... helps to sleep as I use it at bedtime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent anti inflammatory
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I take every night help with inflamación and I sleep better
customer_reviews.author: Joshua leos

customer_reviews.title: Turmeric wonder
customer_reviews.text: This turmeric powder is amazing. It has helped with my arthritis. I will continue to buy this product time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain and inflammation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a friends recommendation. Made it for myself and several old school nurses with bad knees and inflammation. They raved about not having to take so much ibuprofen. And it helped my ailments as well. Tastes pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey A Legaski

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Used this with warmed, unsweetened vanilla almond milk and it was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Package was delivered on time products good.
customer_reviews.text: this picture is exactly as i found my package. Thank you . I'm about to start using some of my items excited about that.
customer_reviews.author: Tatagamgam

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awful but the effects are good. Has helped me with carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: JlCAK

customer_reviews.title: Fair taste, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fair flavor, tried it a few ways. Hard to drink daily.
customer_reviews.author: Nutrimentality

customer_reviews.title: Golden, Baby, Golden!
customer_reviews.text: I love this zesty and creamy stuff in some hot water. It has really helped my insomnia, and it just feels great going down. Thanks folks.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great taste - bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - it tastes delicious the only negative was that although it was wrapped nicely in the box with paper, the lid was cracked and the seal was broken.

product_meta.title: Gaia Herbs, Golden Milk Powder, Stress Support, Ashwaganda, Black Pepper, Cardamom, Date Palm, Turmeric, Vanilla, Vegan Powder Supplement, 3.7-Ounce
feature_bullets: AYURVEDIC HERBAL TONIC: A traditional and rejuvenating wellness ritual used to support the mind and body. Golden Milk is perfect for adults with busy, overactive lives.
COMFORTING & DELICIOUS: A caffeine free drink mix that provide the benefits of Turmeric in a convenient beverage blend to nourish your body and spirit.

ORGANIC HERBAL BLEND: We combine organic Turmeric, Ashwagandha, Black Pepper, Dates, Cardamom and Vanilla bean to deliver a convenient modern spin on a revered ancient drink and daily wellness ritual.

MADE AT THE GAIA CERTIFIED ORGANIC FARM: We are committed to using only non-GMO ingredients. Our products are purity tested and do not contain gluten, soy, dairy, meat, peanuts, sesame, shellfish, yeast or eggs.
30 DAY SUPPLY: Includes 1 (3.7 Ounce) Gaia Herbs Golden Milk Herbal Supplement. We suggest taking 1 teaspoon once daily mixed into a warm beverage of your choice.
Directions: Adults Take 1 Teaspoon Once Daily Mixed Into Any Warm Milk Of Your Choice. May Also Be Added To A Tea, Smoothie, Or A Hot Or Chilled Cup Of Water.

Ingredients: Turmeric Root (Curcuma Longa), Date Palm Fruit (Phoenix Dactylifera), Cardamom Seed (Elettaria Cardamomum), Vanilla Bean (Vanilla Planifolia), Ashwagandha Root (Withania Somnifera), Black Pepper Fruit (Piper Nigrum) Organic Maltodextrin

Safety Warning: Not For Use During Pregnancy Or Lactation. If You Have A Medical Condition Or Take Medications, Please Consult With Your Doctor Before Using This Product. Keep Away From Children. Store Out Of Direct Sunlight And In A Cool, Dry Place.This Product Is Labelled To United States Standards And May Differ From Similar Products Sold Elsewhere In Its Ingredients, Labeling And Allergen Warnings
